remarks: The inverse of a group element expressed in terms of the identity element.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinv.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpinv.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoinvid1 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = B <-> ( A G B ) = U ) ) $.
